description: Geomar produces gourmet canned seafood, working closely with local fishermen communities to gurantee stable sourcing and responsible capture.
GeoPagos provides end-to-end digital payment solutions for banks, processors, acquirers and payment facilitators across Latin America.
GeoVictoria is a technology company that delivers workforce management solutions and analytics tools.
Gera is a company that provides direct selling, SaaS, cloud software, omnichannel, ERP, CRM, retail & commercial back office services.

German Imaging Technologies is an independent document printing solutions provider in MENA, enabling clients to save 30%+ on their printing while not compromising on reliability unlike other OEM alternatives.
Gesto offers a platform that allows clients to identify and manage healthcare risk in an easier more efficient way. The company was acquired by Dasa in 2020.

GIINT is a biotechnology laboratory that offers stem cell banking services and invests in R&D with first class PhD researchers and doctors, and in synergy with hospitals working on regenerative medicine to treat chronic diseases.
Glamping Hub is an online booking portal for customers looking to combine luxury and the great outdoors.
GlamST is an AR Technology company enabling customers to try on makeup through AR. GlamST was acquired by Ulta Beauty in 2018.

Through its proprietary payment assurance, data collection devices and mobility service platform, Global Mobility Service partners with financial institutions to offer auto loans to those who fail credit screenings.
Gocase enables customers to express themselves by providing fashionable cases and accessories for cell phones.

GOI is a shipping logistics company that operates last mile delivery at the province level across Europe, where logistics operators do not have specific services for bulky products, especially furniture and appliances.
Goiko is a Spanish hamburger chain known for its delicious products, honest brand, great atmosphere, and community engagement. Goiko announced a partial sale to L. Catterton in 2018.
GOintegro is the leading social HR platform in Latin America. GOintegro streamlines internal communications and strengthens the positive impact of company culture with cloud-based applications.
Good People is building a global community for action sports fans both online via its social e-commerce site
GoQuo provides leading Airlines and OTAs a full-service e-commerce solution to create a personalized and inspiring digital shopping experience for their customers.
Gourmet Investment Group (GIG) manufactures premium quality food and ingredients using state-of-the-art kitchens including a butchery, bakery, pastry kitchen, ice cream laboratory, among others.
Gram Games is a mobile gaming company which is the creator of global hits such as 1010! and Merge. It was acquired by Zynga in 2018.
GreatSoft provides accounting firms with high-quality CRM solutions to manage the administration, from time capture, billing, marketing, to practice financials.

Green Cola produces the first cola-style soft drink made with stevia, combining a great cola taste with caffeine from green coffee beans, and with zero calories and no aspartame, sugar, artificial sugar substitutes or other health-compromising ingredients.
